abstract: The bank, the second-largest in the United States after JPMorgan Chase, swung to a profit in the second quarters. But investors are increasing their demands that Bank of America repurchase soured mortgages, arguing they were improperly underwritten and sold to them in the first place.

headline.main: Bank of America Posts $2.5 Billion Profit, but Mortgage Woes Remain
